thread.title: Ocado shares soar on deal with Kroger to enter the U.S.

title: Ocado shares soar on deal with Kroger to enter the U.S.
text:
Ocado shares soar on deal with Kroger to enter the U.S. 4:28pm IST - 01:00
Britain's online supermarket Ocado clinched a game-changing deal with Kroger as its exclusive partner in the U.S., securing its entry into the world's biggest market and sending its shares up 50 percent. Jacob Greaves reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Britain's online supermarket Ocado clinched a game-changing deal with Kroger as its exclusive partner in the U.S., securing its entry into the world's biggest market and sending its shares up 50 percent. Jacob Greaves reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2wNTeHo
